attributes.action: To press the Iraqi government to free Mrs. Rajaa Aidan Al Kazraji
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Rajaa Aidan Al Khazraji mother of 5 children arrested and taken from her house in Kuba north east Baquba on Sunday 29th November 2009.Diyala Province's special forces responsible for guarding the head of the police there: Abdul Hussain Damouk Al Shumari. He confirmed the arrest of Mrs. Khazraji under the terrorism act. Her brother however is certain the accusation is false, leveled as a result of a personal grudge. Human rights lawyers confirm many cases of arrests and detention are based on false intelligence,see Reuters article.
"Murder, threats mark judge's life in violent N.Iraq".
Dated 29th Nov 2009
End the practice of detention first and proper investigations later if at all. In the case of women and especially mothers we call on the Iraqi security forces to investigate the allegations, question the women in their own homes and only resort to detention if there is credible evidence pointing to her guilt. Free Rajaa Al Khazraji now! Reunite her with her children. End arbitrary arrests in Iraq.
